channel.title: Tzuchieh Lin | Bioit Station (BITS) | Academia Sinica

item.title: Short human eccDNAs are predictable from sequences
Identification and comparative analysis of long non-coding RNAs in the brain of fire ant queens in two different reproductive states
iTARGEX analysis of yeast deletome reveals novel regulators of transcriptional buffering in S phase and protein turnover.
TFAS
item.description: Alternative splicing (AS), the selective removal of exons and reconnection of exons by multiple processes, shapes how genetic information controls important cellular functions in different tissues of higher metazoans. In this project, we would like to investigate the association between AS and chromatin accessibility of promoter bound by different TFs genome-widely.

item.title: Borders of Cis-Regulatory DNA Sequences Preferentially Harbor the Divergent Transcription Factor Binding Motifs in the Human Genome
